name: David Ramirez
text: Oh, hang on! Right. I want to add Mystery Men into my list, but don't know what I'd bump out. I guess I'd bump out the Michael Keaton Batman because it's in my list for campy with moments of serious.    I can't remember, did the Indian guy have any abilities other than motivational speech and (I think) costume design?    Also, hmm. I guess if Batman counts as a superhero, V from V for Vendetta should also count. So, hmm. Hmm. I'd bump out Batman Begins to put in V for Vendetta, because they're both super-serious treatments.    So, my amended list: V for Vendetta, Superman 2, Avengers, Mystery Men, Iron Man.
